author: jonesde
msg: Fixed APACHE2_HEADER according to new policy

author: byersa
msg: ContentServices.xml setContentStatus does not use content role based security. It only test whether or not a user has CONTENTMGR_CREATE/ADMIN privileges.
I have added a call to the checkContentPermission service.
This fix may not be in line with new security scheme, but it will serve as a good place to evaluate how it would be done in the new scheme.

author: sichen
msg: Removing some code which must have been committed accidentally as part of some NPE fixes.  These always truncated the file name of attachments down to the first 17 characters, when in fact the field can take up to 100.  Let me know if this code was actually intentional

author: rhs
msg: removed XXX from resend, centralized message deliver, cleaned up exception handling, added per channel max frame size
